issue:

Whether on 11.04.2017 at about 4:00 PM at vilage Tengagaon (Alubari) within the jurisdiction of Sorbhog PS, District Barpeta,

Discussion, decision and reasons thereof
ANALYSIS:
4 10. From the above discussion of the evidences of the prosecution witnesses, it is revealed that none of prosecution witnesses,
even the informant and the victim have supported the case of the FIR.

They have simply stated that the victim i.e. PW3 ran out of the house of the accused out of fear.
None of the prosecution witnesses has made a single whisper regarding sexual assault on the victim.
Under such circumstances, it is clear that the prosecution has failed to prove beyond all reasonable doubt any case against the accused person.


11. Under the above facts and circumstances, it is clear that prosecution has failed to bring home the guilt of the accused person for any offence.
decision:
Therefore the accused person is acquitted and set at liberty.

12. Bail bond executed by the accused person and the surety are extended for another period of six months from the date of this judgment under section 437-A Cr.P.C.
